entity.Name: Opportunity

Description.description: Potential revenue-generating event, or sale to an account, which needs to be tracked through a sales process to completion.
Value of the Awarded Value in base currency.
Value of the Competitor Award Price in base currency.
Value of the Contract Award Value in base currency.

label.description: No Pursue - White Paper Not Selected

Description.description: Value of the Submitted Value in base currency.

label.description: Firm Fixed Priced Level of Effort

displayname.description: How do we win this competition?

Description.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.
Type a subject or descriptive name, such as the expected order or company name, for the opportunity.

entity.MobileOfflineFilters: <fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false"> <entity name="opportunity"> <filter type="and"> <condition attribute="modifiedon" operator="last-x-days" value="10"/> </filter> </entity> </fetch>
